entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greenwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:55 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
